com.github.curriculeon.greeps

Class ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • com.github.curriculeon.greeps.ScoreBoard

  • public class ScoreBoard
extends greenfoot.Actor
    The ScoreBoard is used to display results on the screen. It can display some text and several numbers.

      ScoreBoard(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String text, java.lang.String prefix, int map, int[] scores)
